data.text:

Integrated into the Tangem Wallet, it lets users supply assets directly to Aave, DeFi's largest and most trusted lending network. https://t.co/2kjKd4s7mv

Users can now deposit cash and stablecoins into dedicated vaults on Kraken to earn yield from DeFi's most-trusted lending network. https://t.co/FY1PiVQEMT
Learn more: https://t.co/Cdtu16lozW

urls.title: How Aave V4 Handles Risk Isolation Without Fragmenting Liquidity

urls.title: Arbitrum
urls.description: Aave has solidified its role as a cornerstone of Arbitrum's ecosystem, establishing the chain as the premier "home of DeFi."

data.text:
Importantly, Arbitrum users demonstrate strong borrowing demand, with the highest utilization rate across all Aave deployments at around 78%.

Arbitrum also ranks first in active borrowers across all Aave markets, with over 25,000 positions. https://t.co/FNmZs8Hvmb

Aave's share of Arbitrum's total TVL has steadily increased over time, starting in the mid-single digits and reaching 40% by December 2025.

More users and more capital are flowing to Aave. https://t.co/34umBOAzBz

Aave launched on @arbitrum in 2022 and has become the second largest cross-chain deployment.

We've published a case study detailing Aave's success on the network.

Read it below ↓ https://t.co/XlhLwaCBrc
Aave App will change how you, and everyone you know, interacts with DeFi forever. https://t.co/ZhChnULHfO

In four months, @capmoney_ has deposited over $300M of its cUSD reserves in Aave.

These reserves provide a reliable, and scalable, DeFi base rate to cUSD stakers. https://t.co/w54uUPX3UI
Find more GHO data via @Token_Logic's dashboard here: https://t.co/krjXF24MLr

urls.title: Aave Analytics | TokenLogic
urls.description: Monitor GHO's key performance metrics including price, supply, distribution and collateral. On chains with Aave -governed facilitators, balances are determined by facilitator bucket level set by governance, with cross-chain transfers facilitated by Chainlink CCIP. On Lens, GHO is bridged onto Lens though Across Protocol Bridge This table lists the GHO minted by each Ethereum-based facilitator. As cross-chain facilitators lock/release on Ethereum and mint/burn on destination chains, this Ethereum-anchored

On-chain MetaMask USD is powered by M0, a dec...

data.text:
Liquidations are essential for keeping lending markets safe.

Since launch, Aave has processed over $3.3B in liquidations to protect the protocol against bad debt.

We've published a blog post introducing V4's new liquidation engine and how it improves on V3's approach. https://t.co/LE3zX4FN1V
Read it here: https://t.co/AtKhzYzAHw

urls.title: Aave V4's New Liquidation Engine
urls.description: Aave is an Open Source Protocol to create Non-Custodial Liquidity Markets to earn interest on supplying and borrowing assets with a variable interest rate. The protocol is designed for easy integration into your products and services.

data.text: Case study here: https://t.co/abNY0eYHEu

urls.title: Tangem
urls.description: How Tangem uses Aave to Power Non-Custodial Yield.

data.text:
After integrating Aave, @Tangem users can now supply stablecoins to Aave’s liquidity pools to earn yield.

Tangem’s "Yield Mode" makes this quick and easy. We've published a case study on how it works.

Read it below ↓ https://t.co/5XODe1VgJQ

Aave App takes the mystery out of saving.

With Future Mode, you can forecast your savings, revealing what you'll have in a year, five years, and beyond. https://t.co/XAQysa7jXw

The next phase of stablecoin adoption should emerge from embedded DeFi, focusing specifically on credit and yield.

To learn more about how Aave can help with this, read here: https://t.co/k1xYqNrno5

urls.title: How Aave is Powering Latin America's Stablecoin Revolution
urls.description: Aave is bringing real yield, credit, and capital efficiency to the hundreds of millions of Latin Americans embracing stablecoins.

data.text:
For example, the Argentina-based fintech @lemonapp_ar integrated Aave in 2022 for its Earn program.

Fast forward to 2025, and Aave now powers yields on deposits for over 130,000 users who have opted into Lemon Earn. https://t.co/8rU4Nvxpe5

Despite clear demand for stablecoins, DeFi adoption has lagged compared to overall crypto usage and activity.

Chainalysis also shared that LatAm users rely more on centralized service providers compared to users elsewhere around the globe.

This is where embedded DeFi shines. https://t.co/aTbZBvbTl9

According to Chainalysis, crypto transfer volumes in LatAm increased from 53% to 63% year-over-year growth in 2025.

This is led by fintech apps integrating crypto and offering fiat on-ramps, remittance services, and connecting with local payment systems. https://t.co/rqff53aLfB

A stablecoin revolution is underway in Latin America.

With partners like @lemonapp_ar, @RipioApp, @buenbit, and @belo_app, Aave is playing an important role in it. https://t.co/wIXPWHBfs0

Aave's Horizon RWA market is the largest and fastest-growing market for RWA-backed loans.

See @LlamaRisk's report on Horizon's key trends since launch: https://t.co/FQWxvzqg1t
Shoutout to @aixarizzo for the amazing Argentina inspo.

Argentinians are using crypto to escape inflation and protect their savings.

It shows what, and who, crypto is really for. https://t.co/P8EU6cJgFT
Learn more about this partnership: https://t.co/pkAOnk0ZI8

urls.title: Aave Labs Partners with CoW Swap
urls.description: Aave Labs has entered into a strategic partnership with CoW Swap, the leading DEX aggregator and pioneer of intent-based trading.

data.text:
CoW Swap also powers https://t.co/uaJ3qsRWMw's swap adapters, which let you manage complex positions in a single transaction.

You can repay borrows using collateral, swap between collateral types, change debt positions, or withdraw and swap assets.

https://t.co/3PplbsRd7F

urls.title: Aave Labs
urls.description: The most trusted financial network. Earn, borrow, save, and swap.

data.text: Thanks again to everyone who participated and made DeFi Day del Sur a day to remember. https://t.co/GFv8ZNJ1tz

In closing, we covered one of the hottest topics, stablecoins, featuring @jacqmelinek from @TokenRelations, William Reilly from @chainlink, @claberus from @kpk_io, Mark Phillips from @grovedotfinance, and @nlevine19 from @Visa. https://t.co/nI3CibzqnJ

With Buenos Aires becoming the crypto capital of LATAM, we learned about regional adoption with @CamiRusso from @DefiantNews, @mbeaudroit from @belo_app, @lemoncheli from @lemonapp_ar, @sserrano44 from @RipioApp, and @fernandezdiego from @sovraio. https://t.co/1ruLkXE2kR

Then we explored the widely discussed topic of Ethereum alignment with @amandacassatt from @serotonin_hq, @tkstanczak from @ethereumfndn, @sgoldfed from @arbitrum, and @StaniKulechov, founder of @aave. https://t.co/QE958tq6fl

We also talked about powering commerce through crypto rails with @debsoon from @privy_io, Massimo Cervesato from @Mastercard, @DeclanFox14 from @LineaBuild, @kylejenke from @Optimism, @MattSchmenk from @avax, and @Solomontesfaye_ from @Aptos. https://t.co/d98JHMPZrv

Next, we discussed RWAs, from pilot to scale, with @defisebs from Aave Labs, @Mona_El_Isa from @avantgardefi, @carlosdomingo from @Securitize, @TFGolden from @BaillieGifford, and Alexandre Elkrief from @upshift_fi. https://t.co/hEcvwbleQk

@1inch @Uniswap @CoWSwap @Optimism @chaoslabs @avax @LineaBuild The first panel of the day covered some of the most interesting breakthroughs in DeFi with @amandacassatt from @serotonin_hq, Drew Turchin from @Uniswap, @k06a from @1inch, @AnnaMSGeorge from @CoWSwap, @willwarren from @0xProject, and @miguelmtzinf from Aave Labs. https://t.co/rfJEKvb05I

DeFi Day del Sur was a huge success, with great programming and even better vibes. Thanks to everyone who made it out.

Here’s a look back at the panels from the event 👻 https://t.co/B4wHUGhbN4
Aave on @Aptos crossed $50 million deposits. https://t.co/YysP1wC5in

Thanks to everyone who showed up and supported Aave in Buenos Aires.

See you all at the next one! https://t.co/OqyA0FvVrS

After we announced Aave App, @0xMari0 took the stage to introduce it to the audience at Devconnect.

He covered why Aave Labs built it, the problem it solves, and gave a sneak peek of its features. https://t.co/y7f4ePCg5h
Throughout the week, @StaniKulechov gave several talks on the main stage covering credit as the engine behind civilization, stablecoins, the future of DeFi, and more. https://t.co/jVRgXjrV3I

@EFDevcon First, a huge shout out to everyone who visited the Aave booth during @EFDevcon.

The Aave community is bigger than ever, and it was fun meeting the users, builders, and partners ushering in the next era of finance. https://t.co/ZF67jDokQ6

It was a historic week for Aave in Buenos Aires 👻

With friends from around the world, we introduced Aave App, launched V4 testnet, and deployed a preview of Aave Pro. https://t.co/JdiX4mAj6L
DeFi will win.

The Aave App waitlist is now live.

If you want to be the first to try it out, sign up today and refer your friends.

Get started here: https://t.co/KXuU32A7VH

Most importantly, the Aave App passes the "Fintech Test."

To pass this test, you place someone in front of a fintech app and ask, "Is it powered by blockchains?" 

If they can't answer with certainty, it passes. This is critical for mass adoption. https://t.co/Yzy64O2FZK

With industry-leading rates, zero-fee onramping, and up to $1M in balance protection, Aave App is in a category of its own.

Under the hood, it's powered by Aave Protocol, which is already home to over $50B deposits and 2.5M+ users. https://t.co/DpNWnMBXUo

Aave App is a brand-new app designed and engineered by Aave Labs for everyone.

At its core, it's a user-friendly savings tool, and it makes DeFi truly accessible to all. https://t.co/FucMGZW3O5

During @EFDevconnect, we announced Aave App.

Then, @0xMari0 took the stage to explain why we're building it, what makes it special, and how it will onboard millions of users. https://t.co/EJbzmJEYLd
Watch it here: https://t.co/599WsxnflQ https://t.co/Ll1FzI23G8

data.text:
Yield Mode is built into the Tangem Wallet and allows users to supply assets directly to Aave.

By integrating with Aave, Tangem can provide their users access to DeFi's largest, and most trusted, lending protocol.

Introducing @Tangem Yield Mode, powered by Aave.

Access yield in seconds within your self-custodial wallet. https://t.co/Qtm5U2x1IA
